I must agree with a few individuals in here, it is rather pathetic to see so many threaten the life of the author for simply making netorare. Many seem to go as far as saying that the author's had this happen to them, which I have no idea how they can infer that. It is like saying that the author must have been raped to make the one's about rape. Point is, it shows an inability to handle genres with slightly more stomach churning material in them. Honestly, the authors probably do not even think this stuff happens in reality. Why? Because it is so detached from reality, that it is cartoonish. I complain about netorare because the plots and characters are awful most of the time. That is a criticism you could make of an author instead of threatening him.
